description.@en: My will demands aim to find its target . . .and my will is true as steel.

effect.@en: After successfully casting, the branch either points the way toward any threat you can name who is classified as Humanoid (including player cultures), finds a source of water or points to a location you can name. This Spell requires Concentration.

criticalFailure.@en: The branches split, as you suffer [[/roll 1D10+1]] Damage, but do not suffer Injuries due to it.

reagents.@en: Two branches of witch hazel, crossed over one another
